extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

clusters.name: Thermostat User Interface Configuration
clusters.description: This cluster provides an interface to allow configuration of the user interface for a thermostat, or a thermostat controller device, that supports a keypad and LCD screen.

attributes.name: TemperatureDisplayMode
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the units of the temperature displayed on the thermostat screen.

attributes.name: KeypadLockout
attributes.valueRange: NoLockout, Lockout1, Lockout2, Lockout3, Lockout4, Lockout5
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the level of functionality that is available to the user via the keypad.

attributes.name: ScheduleProgrammingVisibility
attributes.description: This attribute is used to hide the weekly schedule programming functionality or menu on a thermostat from a user to prevent local user programming of the weekly schedule.
